includedAssets.title: The List
includedAssets.synopsis: Having been promoted to company CEO, Robert California (James Spader) creates a rift in the office by accidentally revealing a mysterious list.

includedAssets.synopsis: When Robert sets the sales staff a tough challenge, Andy creates a very personal prize to motivate the team.

includedAssets.title: Doomsday
includedAssets.synopsis: To motivate the office staff, Dwight constructs a Doomsday machine that will send a damaging email to Robert if they make too many mistakes.

includedAssets.synopsis: Dwight confronts Robert in an effort to force his way up the corporate ladder, while the rest of the team take part in a pub quiz.

includedAssets.title: Season 8
includedAssets.synopsis: The new manager of the Scranton branch attempts to fill Michael Scott's big shoes in this eighth season of the multi-award-winning US comedy. Rainn Wilson and John Krasinski star.
